title: Add _ignore file suffix support
body: Go already supports `_GOOS`, `_GOARCH` and `GOOS_GOARCH` fix suffixes. Add support for `_ignore` that is the same as `// +build ignore`. That can be useful when providing Go templates, e.g. `config_ignore.go` that contains config with empty fields so the user can `cp config_ignore.go config.go` and fill `config.go`.
